name: NextAirDate
0:
”Alexa, ask Next Air Date about Shark Tank?”
”The next air date of The Big Bang Theory”
”Ask Next Air Date for The Flash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: next air date
des:
Just ask the next air date for any TV series. No need of cumbersome TV Guides, just ask Alexa about your favorite shows in one statement. The show can be in any language but the name must be English. Combined information from TVDb, EpisodeCalendar and others through Trakt API.

*The date might be a little inaccurate for shows that air near midnight because of varying time zones.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
